Body:
"""
        choose values that simplify the calculations and are similar to
        observed values
    """
KLratio = firm.get_KLratio_from_r(r, p, method)
assert np.allclose(KLratio, expected, atol=1e-06)
pytest.mark.parametrize('r,p,method,expected', [(r1, p1, 'SS', expected1),
    (r1, p2, 'SS', expected2), (r1, p3, 'SS', expected3), (r4, p4, 'TPI',
    expected4)], ids=['epsilon=0.8,SS', 'epsilon=1.2,SS', 'epsilon=1.0,SS',
    'epsilon=0.5,TP'])
